[dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/) is a grammar of data manipulation, providing a consistent set of verbs that help you solve the most common data manipulation challenges.

# setup

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(medicaldata)
```

# filter

```{r}
strep_tb |> 
  filter(arm == "Control")
```

```{r}
strep_tb |> 
  filter(arm == "Control", gender == "M")
```

```{r}
strep_tb |> 
  filter(arm == "Control" & gender == "M")
```

# pull

```{r}
strep_tb |> 
  pull(patient_id)
```

# select

```{r}
strep_tb |> 
  select(patient_id)
```
